table_of_contents.title: From Jean de Cheverus to Jacques Maritain : two centuries of French presence in the Archdiocese of Boston / Francois Gauthier
Papism and politics in Massachusetts / Thomas H. O'Connor
Charity, justice, and the church in Boston : the work of Catholic charities / J. Bryan Hehir
Catholic schools : a tradition of responsiveness to non-dominant cultures / Joseph M. O'Keefe
I am a Catholic just as I am a dweller on the planet : John Boyle O'Reilly, Louise Imogen Guiney, and a model of exceptionalist Catholic literature in Boston / Libby MacDonald Bischof
People of faith, people of color : 200 years of diversity in the Archdiocese of Boston / William C. Leonard
The role of women in the Archdiocese of Boston / Carol Hurd Green
Changing patterns of parish life in the Archdiocese of Boston / William T. Schmidt
Boston's Catholics and their bishops : a comparative view / James M. O'Toole.

subtitle: the influence of Catholicism on Boston, 1808-2008
title: Two centuries of faith

notes.value:
"A Herder & Herder book."

Includes bibliographical references and index.
